articles.title: Climbers rescued after three days on mountain in India - BBC.com
articles.description: Fay Manners says she is "mentally destroyed" after a battle for survival 20,000ft up a mountain.
articles.content:
Fay Manners (right) climbed Chaukhamba mountain with her climbing partner Michelle Dvorak (left)
A British climber who went missing in the Himalayas has spoken of her relief after surviving for two … [+4499 chars]
